location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Persian Gulf Gazetteer, Part I Historical and Political Materials, Précis of Koweit [Kuwait] Affairs, 1896-1904'

physicalDescription.extent: There is a list of contents at the front of the volume.

Pagination: the volume contains an original pagination sequence, which commences at 1 on the front cover, and terminates at 116 on the back cover. These numbers are printed, with additions in pencil, and can be found in the top centre of each page. Pagination anomalies: pp. 1 1A, 1B, 1C, 1D, 1E; pp. 2, 2A, 2B, 2C, 2D, 2E, 2F, 2G.

mods.abstract: The volume is Persian Gulf Gazetteer, Part I Historical and Political Materials, Précis of Koweit Affairs, 1896-1904(Simla: G C Press, 1904).The volume contains a history of Kuwait, 1896-1904.
